1.text: Sketch a swinging boat design in your notebook.

2.text: Build a boat using index cards.

3.text: Attach the boat to one of the binder clips.

4.text: Look at your notebook design for ideas on how to make the swing.

5.text: Use your remaining craft materials to build the swing support.

6.text: Attach your boat to the swing support.

7.text: Test your boat swing by pushing it with your hand.

8.text: Place magnets around the swing structure.

9.text: Add some magnets to your boat.

10.text: Test your boat swing to see if it swings for at least 15 seconds.

11.text: Experiment with putting your magnets in different places.

12.text: Compare your boat swing with your original design.
